data.name: Jhoer Perez
data.profile: Full-Stack Developer with +2 years of experience developing web applications using JavaScript, React, Nodejs, Python, and Flask. Aiming to build better products I've both developed several applications from scratch and given support to others always seeking to reduce bugs and improve the quality of the code. I'm a lot into web and mobile development, and I'm constantly learning new technologies currently blockchain.
